name: Gator Invaders (Demo)
description:
Gator Invaders Demo is 5 stages of hair raising, old school, shmup action, complemented by a mosh pit inducing, guitar driven, hard rock/metal soundtrack. 

 This game is currently in active development, so there are some missing features. Currently it has only been tested on the Windows platform, with very limited X-Box style controller support. 

Two simple gameplay-test cheats were left in this build. Pressing backspace will give the player full health, and using the plus and minus keys on the numeric keyboard section will change your plane's firemode. 

If you encounter any bugs, or other fun-stopping events, please feel free to let the dev know.

OST available at:

THIS ALBUM IS NOT CLICKBAIT | Dog In Box Studio (bandcamp.com)
